dotnet /

      AspNetCore.Docs---Documentation for ASP.NET Core

Awesome-HarmonyOS /

      HarmonyOS---A curated list of awesome things related to HarmonyOS. 华为鸿蒙操作系统。

prisma /

      prisma---Next-generation ORM for Node.js & TypeScript | PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, SQL Server & SQLite

deepfakes /

      faceswap---Deepfakes Software For All

black7375 /

      Firefox-UI-Fix---🦊 I respect proton UI and aim to improve it.

zooPanda /

      zoo---你我本是动物，我不该责怪你动物的本性，但请你给我足够的尊重，谢谢，共勉。

TheAlgorithms /

      Java---All Algorithms implemented in Java

public-apis /

      public-apis---A collective list of free APIs

norvig /

      pytudes---Python programs, usually short, of considerable difficulty, to perfect particular skills.

pmndrs /

      racing-game---🏎 Open source racing game developed by everyone willing

kzl /

      decision-transformer---Official codebase for Decision Transformer: Reinforcement Learning via Sequence Modeling.

fabionoth /

      awesome-cyber-security---A collection of awesome software, libraries, documents, books, resources and cools stuffs about security.

Snailclimb /

      JavaGuide---「Java学习+面试指南」一份涵盖大部分 Java 程序员所需要掌握的核心知识。准备 Java 面试，首选 JavaGuide！

sindresorhus /

      awesome---😎 Awesome lists about all kinds of interesting topics

googleapis /

      googleapis---Public interface definitions of Google APIs.

yqchilde /

      JDMemberCloseAccount---学习python操作selenium的一个🌰，用来 自动/半自动 退出加入的所有店铺会员

trekhleb /

      javascript-algorithms---📝 Algorithms and data structures implemented in JavaScript with explanations and links to further readings

chinnkarahoi /

      jd_scripts---lxk0301/jd_scripts备份。不要star。不要fork。谢谢配合。

flutter /

      flutter---Flutter makes it easy and fast to build beautiful apps for mobile and beyond.

twbs /

      bootstrap---The most popular HTML, CSS, and JavaScript framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.

Advanced-Frontend /

      Daily-Interview-Question---我是依扬（木易杨），公众号「高级前端进阶」作者，每天搞定一道前端大厂面试题，祝大家天天进步，一年后会看到不一样的自己。

plotly /

      plotly.js---Open-source JavaScript charting library behind Plotly and Dash

cilium /

      cilium---eBPF-based Networking, Security, and Observability

rahuldkjain /

      github-profile-readme-generator---🚀 Generate GitHub profile README easily with the latest add-ons like visitors count, GitHub stats, etc using minimal UI.

grafana /

      grafana---The open and composable observability and data visualization platform. Visualize metrics, logs, and traces from multiple sources like Prometheus, Loki, Elasticsearch, InfluxDB, Postgres and many more.
